title: President, PM condole death of MNA Aamir Liaquat
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 9 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi and Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif expressed grief and sorrow over the death of Member of National Assembly Dr Aamir Liaquat Hussain.
In their separate messages, the president and prime minister prayed for the soul of Aamir Liaquat to rest in peace.
They also prayed for the grant of patience to his family to bear the loss.
